description: Negative for creation of order. Without authorization. Should return status code 500

steps.name: Sending createUser request with email = 858929795testUserName@test.com, password = 12345678, name = 858929795testUserName
Create order request with ingredients ={ingredients} and without authorization
Checking response code is equal to expected 500
